effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.black_white: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.black_white: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.
